text: The Progressive Party (), formerly known as the Minjung Party (, ) until June 2020, is a left-wing progressive and left-wing nationalist political party in South Korea. Democratic socialists in South Korea, including the Labour Party, criticize the Justice Party and Progressive Party for allegedly being liberal rather than progressive. Some see the Progressive Party as centre-left. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Political parties in South Korea
title: Progressive Party (South Korea, 2017)
